info.title: Adafruit IO
info.description: The Internet of Things for Everyone

get.summary: Get information about the current user

get.description: The Activities endpoint returns information about the user's activities.

get.summary: Get activities by type for current user
get.description: The Activities endpoint returns information about the user's activities.
The Feeds endpoint returns information about the user's feeds. The response includes the latest value of each feed, and other metadata about each feed.
Returns feed based on the feed key

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Feed

get.description: Returns more detailed feed record based on the feed key
get.summary: Get detailed feed by feed key

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: A resolution size in seconds. By giving a resolution value you will get back grouped data points averaged over resolution-sized intervals.

get.summary: Returns data based on feed key

get.description: The Groups endpoint returns information about the user's groups. The response includes the latest value of each feed in the group, and other metadata about the group.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Group

post.summary: Add an existing Feed to a Group
Remove a Feed from a Group

get.summary: All feeds for current user in a given group
get.description: The Group Feeds endpoint returns information about the user's feeds. The response includes the latest value of each feed, and other metadata about each feed, but only for feeds within the given group.

post.summary: Create a new Feed in a Group

get.summary: All data for current feed in group

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time for filtering data. Returns data created after given time.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time for filtering data. Returns data created before give time.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of records returned.

get.description: The Dashboards endpoint returns information about the user's dashboards.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Dashboard

get.description: The Blocks endpoint returns information about the user's blocks.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Block

get.description: The Tokens endpoint returns information about the user's tokens.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Token

get.description: The Triggers endpoint returns information about the user's triggers.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Trigger

get.summary: All permissions for current user and type
get.description: The Permissions endpoint returns information about the user's permissions.

patch.summary: Update properties of an existing Permission

StartTime.name: start_time
StartTime.description: Start time for filtering, returns records created after given time.

EndTime.name: end_time
EndTime.description: End time for filtering, returns records created before give time.

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: Limit the number of records returned.

HeaderKey.description: The AIO Key is used to restrict or grant access to your data. The key is unique, and you can generate a key per feed, and control it in many different ways. The easiest process is to just use your automatically generated master key. You can access this key right from the right-hand side of your dashboard or from an individual feed page.
HeaderKey.name: X-AIO-Key

QueryKey.description: The AIO Key is used to restrict or grant access to your data. The key is unique, and you can generate a key per feed, and control it in many different ways. The easiest process is to just use your automatically generated master key. You can access this key right from the right-hand side of your dashboard or from an individual feed page.
QueryKey.name: X-AIO-Key

HeaderSignature.description: The AIO Signature is an AWS inspired request signature.
HeaderSignature.name: X-AIO-Signature

shared_with.description: Access control list for this feed

count.description: Number of data points stored by this feed.
